name: Techlineinfo Social Count and Share
author: Sujith Kumar

sections.description:
This plugin displays a social share counter and sharing icons to share your blog posts on Twitter, Google Plus, Pinterest, Linked-in and Stumbleupon just as seen in the popular website Mashable.
Jquerry plugin from Sharerrr.com is utilized for displaying the share count.

Features

  • No images used- All social media icons are fontawesome fonts.
  • Social Share Counter.
  • Options to enable/disable the plugin in Posts and Pages.
  • Short Code and code to Embed the Plugin in Theme.
  • Responsive design.
  • Social Share Sticky Top Bar
    Please visit the Plugin Support Page for More details and support.

version 1.0.4

*Added options to change Twiiter and Facebook share button text
*Added option to add Twitter handle

version 1.0.3

*Added Social Share Top Bar
*Changed the script for share count.

version 1.0.2

*Some CSS Fixes to make the plugin compatible for most of the Themes.
=Version 1.0.1=

  • CSS Fixes
    =Version 1.0.0=
    *Initial Release.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder of your WordPress installation.
  • Activate the plugin.
  • Plugin settings page can be accessed through the “Techline Social” menu Link
sections.faq: A question that will be asked by users

short_description: A plugin to display social share icons and counter just as Mashable website
